snippet: Sgt. First Class Michael McClendon will serve a 33-month sentence and will be dismissed from the Army after being reduced in rank.
abstract: Sgt First Class Michael McClendon of United States Military Academ in West Point, NY, pleads guilty in case that he secretly videotaped female cadets, some as they undressed in locker room; will serve a 33-month sentence, followed by reduction in rank to private and dismissal from Army.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. First Class Michael McClendon will serve a 33-month sentence and will be dismissed from the Army after being reduced in rank.

headline.main: West Point Sergeant Pleads Guilty to Videotaping Female Cadets
headline.print_headline: West Point Sergeant Pleads Guilty to Videotaping Female Cadets
